00010 #ifndef BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_REF_WRAPPER_UNWRAP_ITERATOR_ER_2010_HPP
00011 #define BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_REF_WRAPPER_UNWRAP_ITERATOR_ER_2010_HPP
00012 #include <boost/mpl/assert.hpp>
00013 #include <boost/mpl/bool.hpp>
00014 #include <boost/type_traits/is_convertible.hpp>
00015 #include <boost/type_traits/remove_cv.hpp>
00016 #include <boost/type_traits/remove_reference.hpp>
00017 #include <boost/type_traits/add_const.hpp>
00018 #include <boost/iterator/iterator_adaptor.hpp>
00019 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/detail/unwrap/reference.hpp>
00020 
00021 // Note : In Boost.Assign.v2, this is deprecated but it could be used 
00022 // elsewhere.
00023 
00024 // Calling
00025 //      *unwrap_iterator( it );
00026 // is equivalent to
00027 //      (*it).unwrap(); 
00028 //  if *it is a reference wrapper, otherwise
00029 //  (*it);
00030 
00031 namespace boost{
00032 namespace assign{ 
00033 namespace v2{
00034 namespace ref{
00035 namespace unwrap_aux{
00036 
00037     template<typename I>
00038     struct reference_of_iterator : unwrap_aux::reference<
00039         typename boost::iterator_reference<I>::type
00040     >{};
00041 
00042     template<
00043         typename I, 
00044         typename R = typename unwrap_aux::reference_of_iterator<I>::type,
00045         typename V = typename boost::remove_reference<R>::type
00046     >
00047     struct iterator : boost::iterator_adaptor<
00048         iterator<I,R,V>           // Derived
00049         ,I                        // Base
00050         ,V                        // Value
00051         ,use_default              // CategoryOrTraversal
00052         ,R                        // Reference
00053         ,use_default              // Difference
00054     >{
00055         typedef boost::iterator_adaptor<
00056                 iterator<I,R,V>, 
00057             I, 
00058             V,
00059             use_default, 
00060             R, 
00061             use_default 
00062         > super_;
00063 
00064         iterator(){}
00065         iterator(I base):super_(base)
00066         {
00067             typedef typename boost::iterator_reference<I>::type ref_;
00068             typedef typename 
00069                 boost::is_convertible<ref_,R>::type is_convertible_;
00070             BOOST_MPL_ASSERT(( is_convertible_ ));
00071         }
00072     };
00073               
00074     template<typename It>
00075     struct is_iterator : boost::mpl::false_{};
00076     
00077         template<typename I, typename R, typename V>
00078     struct is_iterator< unwrap_aux::iterator<I,R,V> >
00079         : boost::mpl::true_{};
00080 
00081 }// unwrap_aux
00082 
00083         template<typename It>
00084     struct is_unwrapped_iterator : unwrap_aux::is_iterator<
00085        typename boost::remove_cv<It>::type
00086     >{};
00087 
00088 namespace result_of{
00089 
00090     template<typename I>
00091     struct unwrap_iterator
00092     {
00093         typedef  unwrap_aux::iterator<I> type;
00094     };
00095 
00096 }// result_of
00097 
00098     template<typename I>
00099     typename result_of::unwrap_iterator<I>::type
00100     unwrap_iterator(const I& base)
00101     {
00102         typedef typename result_of::unwrap_iterator<I>::type result_;
00103         return result_( base );
00104     }
00105 
00106     
00107 }// ref
00108 }// v2
00109 }// assign
00110 }// boost
00111 
00112 #endif
